Class FORMULA_VESSEL

  • java.lang.Object
    • agus.formula.FORMULA_VESSEL

  • public class FORMULA_VESSEL
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all formulas for calculating vessel specific things
    Author:
    Niklas Heidenreich

    • Method Detail

      • BurnTime

        public static float BurnTime(float AvailableThrust,
                             float SpecificImpulse,
                             float Mass,
                             double dV)
        Calculates the burntime for a given deltaV using the rocket equation
        Parameters:
        AvailableThrust - The total available thrust that can be produced by the vessel’s active engines, in Newtons.
        SpecificImpulse - The combined specific impulse of all active engines, in seconds.
        Mass - The total mass of the vessel, including resources, in kg.
        dV - The deltaV that should be used
        Returns:
        burn time needed

      • DeltaVofStage

        public static double DeltaVofStage(double m0,
                                   double mf,
                                   double isp)
        Calculates the deltaV of an rocket stage
        Parameters:
        m0 - The mass of the rocket
        mf - the dry mass of the rocket
        isp - the isp of the engines
        Returns:
        The deltaV of the Rocket/stage

        public static double getRangeAtUT(ORBIT Orbit1,
                                  ORBIT Orbit2,
                                  double UT)
        Calculates the range between 2 objects at the given UT
        Parameters:
        Orbit1 - the orbit of the first object
        Orbit2 - the orbit of the second object
        UT - the time at which to calculate
        Returns:
        the distance in meters between the two objects

        Calculates the range between 2 objects at the given UT
        Parameters:
